body:
A little while ago I made a topic called "Porky's Videos", but that thread was for Minecraft videos and all that.
Since I'm not longer recording Minecraft, I thought I would make this thread for all my Mount & Blade videos, and Fifa 14 videos. :D

Mount & Blade:Warband
2014/11/09 - Mount & Blade Warband (Episode 1): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V6QS_KOgbLo


Fifa 14


More videos will be posted here as I continue to upload.
*This is not recorded on any Minecraft server, so it is not advertising.*

replies.body:
Lol, advertising is if you give the IP of another Minecraft server. Since this is another game, and has nothing to do with Minecraft, I put it in "Off-Topic", and it isn't advertising.
:P

replies.body:
Please remove this post.
Don't show other people's infractions on the public forums please.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I gotta be devil's advocate here and say that this is advertising.
If it's not Avicus related then I don't think it's allowed.
You are promoting your Youtube channel that has nothing to do with the Avicus Network and are therefore advertising.

Other people have posted other games on the forums before, other than Minecraft.
